Human first organisations

Job titles are an artificial label we use to boost our egos. Job title prefixes are an artificial label on an artificial label we use to boost our egos.

Moving towards a capabilities first approach in your organisation empowers your teams to do what they enjoy, not what is being expected of them within our role

Asking these sorts of questions to your team:

  • "What do you enjoy doing?"
  • "What would you like to do more of?"
  • "What do you find easy?"
  • "What would you like to learn?"

Fuck job descriptions. Fuck job titles. Fuck pay grades.

If you enjoy doing a thing, do it. Be good at it.
